data.title: Academy Queen — Fearsome Queer
data.text:
In a past life, I co-hosted an Oscars podcast where we discussed and ranked the acting winners (^) and nominees.

Periodically, I’ll be updating this page with my personal winners as I complete each lineup.

Note: My opinions morph with repeat viewings and new life experiences, so my winners shift over time, too. Anyway, here’s where I stand today…
